post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Number: 4916503

Title: Web graphic designer (Graphic/Web Designer) (NOC: 5241)

Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time, Day

Salary: To be negotiated, Medical Benefits, Dental Benefits, Life Insurance Benefits, Group Insurance Benefits

Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible

Location: Scarborough, Ontario (1 vacancy)

Skill Requirements:

Education: Not applicable

Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Not applicable

Experience: No experience

Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English

Area of Design Specialization: General graphic design, Advertising, Publications, Books

Business Equipment and Computer Applications: Illustrator, Photoshop

Work Setting: Corporation

Type of Technical Illustration: Technical, Software

Specific Skills: Prepare sketches, photographs or illustrations of subjects to be rendered, Prepare specifications for design, Produce final designs or illustrations

Work Samples: Design sample, Example of completed work

Work Conditions and Physical Capabilites: Fast-paced environment, Attention to detail

Work Site Environment: Non-smoking, Air conditioned

Transportation/Travel Information: Public transportation is available

Essential Skills: Reading text, Numeracy, Oral communication, Decision making, Job task planning and organizing, Computer use

Other Information:Must have min of 2 years, knowledge of Rave7 and Excel an asset. Please include a pdf of some graphic work you have designed. Maintain our web site with videos and create we pages,flyers,lit.shts.

Employer: Southwest Binding Systems Limited

How to Apply:

Please apply for this job only in the manner specified by the employer. Failure to do so may result in your application not being properly considered for the position.

By E-mail: sarahc@southwestbindings.com
Business Profile: Manufacturers of presentation system. (binders, tabs, plastic bindings, lam film)

Web Site: http://www.southwestbindings.com

Advertised until: 2010/03/30

This job advertisement has been provided by an external employer. Service Canada is not responsible for the accuracy, authenticity or reliability of the content.
post.title: Web graphic designer (Graphic/Web Designer) (NOC: 5241)
